## Name: Eco-Friendly
#### Author: @JohnHammond
#### Category: Malware
#### Difficulty: N/D
#### Description: This sample is good for the environment!

## Procedure
We can see an ofuscated poweshell script into ```eco_friendly``` file, but from here we can try to emulate the file using dynamic analysis with tools like [anyrun](https://any.run)

````
iex ('{117569}{59212}{61620}{158162}{323627}{11665}{271056}{211572}{252756}{86752}{103488}{94827}{260368}{178693}{255934}{195357}{145904}{186402}{88684}{174794}{129814}{101481}{231958}{216699}{200636}{26882}{113681}{8654}{184834}{183404}{216843}{247322}{141117}{69078}{276864}{169255}{275793}{103622}{218030}{311006}{306236}{255253}{135384}{168819}{178721}{39206}{156060}{314827}{219339}{295281}{44020}{66853}{56954}{139137}{106259}{148231}{137593}{143509}{282127}{171524}{311725}{92416}{100275}{278118}{286610}{136465}{321135}{38320}{135773}{215334}{7824}{100882}{124638}{142274}{89999}{310758}{84862}{51139}{66467}{150799}{162160}{71845}{49192}{71299}{286442}{158348}{324057}{133310}{220639}{96080}{107511}{113488}{268096}{273503}{21688}{291514}{297537}{160173}{62271}{13169}{145661}{149401}{266555}{54274}{145374}{134683}{238358}{74624}{183702}{305623}{241051}{213497}{47365}{169180}{38085}{162332}{295139}{58111}{222103}{244814}{118151}{190463}{212712}{154055}{206669}{25082}{28247}{276563}{42796}{83541}{10930}{174135}{170048}{183687}{270840}{122239}{186455}{197363}{104717}{116029}{138205}{108621}{304777}{10545}{45848}{165618}{312440}{283252}{162888}{284754}{180427}{322538}{241966}{187285}{228904}{131310}{137965}{44864}{53186}{185173}{26174}{265099}{257145}{323403}{197527}{148657}{317828}{214102}{273198}{104181}{261028}{66167}{20201}{285485}{97333}{254198}{263990}{53518}{230680}{205934}{300479}{182074}{123631}{39097}{278116}{67056}{312220}{129558}{18952}{265877}{246694}{63091}{181564}{253858}{22405}{116388}{244984}{145094}{209231}{226120}{140050}{77635}{323840}{206778}{10322}{160566}{188697}{218319}{247883}{3237}{234225}{167034}{6177}{122219}{306339}{106142}{307664}{271098}{45558}{317116}{139406}{152142}{148298}{230268}{281168}{77081}{236675}{227369}{69327}{227769}{243352}{181922}{79790}{158747}{162311}{168135}{60429}{138503}{318694}{216774}{270250}{317204}{31516}{222682}{44379}{14940}{263596}{119700}{110610}{27817}{309841}{243948}{104309}{80296}{17353}{92882}{132733}{14435}{14828 ````
````

This tool allows us to recover the flag easy
